description.en: $Haven is a deflationary token that rewards  holders with BNB every 3 days. $Haven integrates anti-whale features with innovative 'Safetokenomics' to decrease price volatility and incentivise long term holding. $Haven has been designed to combat day traders, whales & bots with revolutionary tokenomics that rewards holders and penalises short selling with a high transaction tax to improve price stability and decrease market volatility.
